name: Adaptive Imaging Technologies
overview:
Adaptive Imaging Technologies is developing a new kind of surveillance camera that we call the “Panoramic Telescope”: a single device that continuously monitors a panoramic field of view while enabling ultrahigh resolution telescopic zooms on any number of independent targets within that panorama. And it does all of this simultaneously.

Winner 2009 Global Security Challenge Our technology is focused on wide-area and persistent surveillance applications. We believe that it will fundamentally improve the protection of borders, transportation systems, urban centers, large sporting facilities, and critical infrastructures of all sorts.

Adaptive is an early stage company. We are located in Yokneam, Israel. We are the 2009 recipient of the Global Security Challenge “Most Promising Startup Award” and expect to launch our first product in 2010.
